name: get_current_weather
description: Get the current weather in a given location

location.description: The city and state, e.g. San Francisco, CA

name: write_to_file
description: Write text to a file on the local system

file_name.description: The name of the file to write to

text.description: The text content to write to the file

mode.description: Whether to write to a new file or append to an existing file

name: read_from_file
description: Read text from a file on the local system

file_name.description: The name of the file to read from

return.description: The text content of the file

name: search_in_docs
description: Search for a term in text documents within the ./docs directory and return their content

search_term.description: The term to search for in the documents

return.description: A dictionary where keys are file names and values are the contents of files in which the search term is found
